headline: Keysight Technologies Completes Acquisition of Spirent Communications PLC
summary: SANTA ROSA, Calif. & LONDON, October 15, 2025--Keysight Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: KEYS), today announced it has completed its acquisition of Spirent Communications plc (LSE: SPT).

raw.headline: Keysight Technologies Completes Acquisition of Spirent Communications PLC
raw.summary: SANTA ROSA, Calif. & LONDON, October 15, 2025--Keysight Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: KEYS), today announced it has completed its acquisition of Spirent Communications plc (LSE: SPT).

headline: Synopsys (SNPS) Gets Approval to Divest Optical and PowerArtist Businesses
summary: Synopsys, Inc. (NASDAQ:SNPS) is one of the 11 Best American Semiconductor Stocks to Invest In. On October 10, Synopsys, Inc. (NASDAQ:SNPS) shared that it has received approval from all necessary authorities to move forward with the planned sale of its Optical Solutions Group and PowerArtist businesses to Keysight Technologies. Regulatory authorities required these divestitures as […]
